glosses.gloss: An abstract genre of art; artistic content depends on internal form rather than pictorial representation
Abstract art uses a visual language of shape, form, color and line to create a composition which may exist with a degree of independence from visual references in the world.
Artistic works that don't attempt to represent reality or concrete subjects
Art with a degree of independence from visual references in the world
The Art that does not depict objects in the natural world, but instead uses shapes and colours in a non-representational or subjective way.
Art that does not depict objects in the natural world, but instead uses color and form in a non-representational way.
Someone who supports or creates abstract art.
The presentation of ideas in an abstract manner.
추상화는 대상의 구체적인 형상을 나타낸 것이 아니라 점, 선, 면, 색과 같은 순수한 조형 요소로 표현한 미술의 한가지 흐름이다.
A representation having no reference to concrete objects or specific examples
Abstractionism is the theory that the mind obtains some or all of its concepts by abstracting them from concepts it already has, or from experience.
